title: Define Air Quality Metrics
description: Research and define the key air quality metrics to be monitored.

title: Design Wearable Device Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture for the wearable device.

title: Develop Sensors Interface for Device
description: Design and develop the interface to connect air quality sensors with the device.

title: Develop User Interface for Device
description: Design and develop the user interface for the device to display air quality data.

title: Integrate Air Quality Sensor Modules
description: Integrate the air quality sensor modules into the wearable device.

title: Implement Air Quality Data Processing Algorithm
description: Develop an algorithm to process the air quality data and determine dangerous levels.

title: Implement Alert System for Dangerous Levels
description: Develop a system to alert users when dangerous air quality levels are detected.
dependencies: Implement Air Quality Data Processing Algorithm
